meanings.definition: A series of names or items written or printed together in a meaningful grouping.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave us a list of books to read over the summer.
meanings.sent2: I always make a grocery list before going to the store.
meanings.sent3: The list of ingredients for the recipe was longer than I expected.
meanings.sent4: Her list of accomplishments was as long as a river.
meanings.sent5: The list of rules was posted on the wall for everyone to see.

meanings.definition: To write down a series of names or items in a meaningful grouping.
meanings.sent1: She lists her favorite movies in a notebook.
meanings.sent2: I need to list all the tasks I have to do today.
meanings.sent3: He lists his excuses for being late every morning.
meanings.sent4: The teacher lists the homework assignments on the board.
meanings.sent5: The chef lists the ingredients needed for the dish on the menu.
